data.title: Wolfgang Flur/MusikSoldat (Ex-Kraftwerk): With special guest Peter Duggal
data.meta_description: The Ferret presents:   WOLFGANG FLUR    (ex-Kraftwerk) / Musik Soldat    with special guests: Peter Duggal // Magnetik Source // Acid Rockers // Demetae // Cottam
data.text:
Wolfgang Flür, robot member of the seminal electronic group Kraftwerk from 1973 to 1987, invented and played much of the group's electric percussion used throughout the 1970s.

A member of Kraftwerk during the group's golden era, he was there from their international breakthrough with the album Autobahn (1974) and remained as they experimented with proto-techno on albums such as Trans-Europe Express (1977) and Computer World (1981).

Musik Soldat ('music soldier') sees this true pioneer performing music from his present projects, including new album MAGAZINE 1, and Kraftwerk past... all with a strong anti-war message.

Don't miss this unique show.

- - -

PETER DUGGAL

Peter Duggal is a musician and producer born and bought up in Handsworth, Birmingham (now based in Hebden Bridge), and the musical partner of Wolfgang Flür (ex Kraftwerk). A veteran of electronic music production, Peter had his first release in 1990 on the RHAM! Records label under the artist name 'Doggy'.

- - -

MAGNETIK SOURCE

Claire Marshall and Andy Byrne, the dynamic force behind Magnetik Source, unite the distinct perspectives of a musicologist and an archaeologist with the expertise of a highly regarded electronic music producer. Guided by a shared belief in the transformative power of electronic music, they intricately fuse the science of psychoacoustics, the innovation of jazz & classical, and the raw rhythms of Detroit techno.

- - -

ACID ROCKERS

Matthew Buggins, AKA Acid Rockers, has been a staple name in House, Breaks and Techno since the early 1990's, heavily inspired by the early Detroit sound with the inimitable alter ego; Bass Culture on D:Vision Records. Curating an impressive array of releases across a wide variety of genres and production aliases from Quark, Cygnus Loop, Hippies with Altitude and Tayo Meets Acid Rockers. A body of work spanning 3 decades found on the likes of AAA Recordings, Harthouse and Sony / Blueroom Records. The chameleon-like Matt Buggins has a rare talent, merging genres seamlessly with melodic fluidity and hauntingly evocative rhythms.

- - -

DEMETAE

From the humble city of Preston, Demetae caught the wave of one of Manchesters biggest promoters and jumped on the Love Dose Records party train. This allowed Rob to vent his passion for music on the turntables in now iconic clubs such as Sankeys, Hidden & The White Hotel. ​Inspired by the echoes of rave in his lugs, Demetae launched his own imprint «Powerful Recordings» with several releases from the likes of Kashpitzky, Barium Network & Sted Mørk.

- - -

COTTAM

Local legend Cottam, one of the finest DJ talents in the UK, completes the lineup for an after-party ft electro-inspired tackle til 2am.

- - -

The Ferret presents:

WOLFGANG FLÜR - Musik Soldat

(ex-Kraftwerk)

with special guests:

Peter Duggal // Magnetik Source // Acid Rockers // Demetae // Cottam

The Ferret, Preston

Friday 21st June 2024

Doors 7PM - 2AM

Wolfgang Flür stage time 9:30pm - 11pm
